summary: Lead Quality Assurance engineer with deep experience orchestrating automation across web, mobile, and API platforms. I design and maintain test suites that safeguard business-critical journeys, partnering with cross-functional teams to embed quality from discovery through deployment. Skilled in modern tooling including Playwright, Jetpack Compose, XCUITest, Postman, Swagger, and Artillery, I balance strategy and hands-on delivery to keep fast-moving products resilient, observable, and release-ready.
